name: Restaurant Cooking Master
description:
RESTAURANT COOKING MASTER is no 1 yummilicious fun cooking game that lets you feed a host of hungry patrons before they leave in a huff and become a star chef!
Cooking Master delivers interactive, addicting fun that is optimized for playing in restaurant environment in different places. Keep customers happy by prepping everything as fast as you can and deliver the best cooked food in the market!
Quick to find the best collection of cooking games in just one app on IOS market.
Download it and setup it to your mobile device the best restaurant game of cook and dash, you can become a chef
Restaurant cooking master is the finest cook and dash game of 2016! Undoubtedly
It’s the most amazingly restaurant cooking fun dash game ever!
Pull your efforts up and sharpen your cooking skill as you assemble, cook and serve delicious menu items in each exotic restaurant lying in beautiful environment … Hear them gasp and cheer as you try to earn more coins and pennies from customers, superstar VIPs, and fast-paced cooking actions at Restaurant.
COOK YOUR HOT SALED DISHES!
Control the fast-paced chaos as you dash your way around the kitchen, preparing meals for crazy customers desperate to eat at the Restaurant! Handle crazy customer quickly within time otherwise the will leave you and will never come back. Collect tons of tips for excellent service and make those profits! YOU ARE DESTINED FOR FABULOUS COOKING GAME OF THE TIME

Tons of fun cooking play across unique restaurant environment and amazing level of cooking with speed and cooking skills!
COLLECT AND UPGRADE!
Serve as many customer as you can in the less period of time is the key to success to become a lead cook at Restaurant. More Customers in less time means more coin and higher place in cooking.

Make special Recipes in the Restaurant and attract customers with their favorite dishes! They’ll get you more and more famous, drop cool items, and give you special powers to blast and keep your star on the rise by competing more missions in less time!
PLAY WITH FRIENDS!
Exchange gifts and compete with friends on your never-ending quest to be the best!
High-end, immersive IOS tablet and Mobile gameplay!
